document_data.name: Vintners', Distillers', & Brewers' Guild
document_data.mainbody: The '''Vintners', Distillers', & Brewers' Guild''' was a guild in [[Waterdeep]], headquartered in the [[House of Good Spirits]] in the [[Southern Ward of Waterdeep]].<ref name="WatN-p25>
document_data.Organization: This guild was headquartered in the House of Good Spirits, a high end brewery, winery, and innÂ noted for its wide variety of liquors and strong drink from across the Realms, though its specialty was a Waterdhavian [[zzar]] brewed on site.<ref name="WatN-44>
